about:
Hey there! I'am Mihir Pathak.

I code, read anythings I can get my hands on and on very rare occasions, write.
I am a CS undergrad with experience working in the web development industry. I currently work as a frontend developer at @pickyourtrail

projects.title: Audius
projects.content: A full fledged desktop application built using electronjs that allows users to download songs from YouTube and Spotify

projects.title: AllQ
projects.content: AllQ is a freelance project that I did for a client that is basically an online E-commerce website that allows users to sell products.

projects.title: KNot
projects.content: A platform that allows users to send targeted notifications to anyone using the KNot mobile application

projects.title: Counter
projects.content: A cross-platform desktop and mobile applications that allows users to create and manipulate realtime counters using FireBase

projects.title: MindKraft 2018
projects.content: Built and deployed a full featured, resonsive website and Android app, along with a REST API and hosted it on an AWS EC2 instance server.

projects.title: Rainbow
projects.content: A CLI based audio library management program that supports audio fingerprinting and metadata embedding library built on Python 3.

projects.title: InkMachine
projects.content: A tiny startup that provides A3 posters, both pre-designed and custom images at a good prices inside campus.

experience.title: Frontend Developer
experience.content: I joined as a React developer @ Pickyourtrail in June of 2019

experience.title: Freelance Web Developer
experience.content: After my internship @ Neevan, I decided to go freelance for a few months before I pick up another job at a company. I've been doing freelancing since 2017 but it was whenever I could get time out of college.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.content: I have been at Neevan IT Solutions as a Full Stack developer since December 2018. I have built sleek and performance oriented websites and for numerous clients since then.

experience.title: Head of Tech Team
experience.content: Appointed for MindKraft 2018 to lead a team of 12 people handling registration and the website.

experience.title: Network Trainee
experience.content: I worked at CTC, Karunya for a period of 8 months where I learnt a great deal about networking and backend management.

certifications.title: Cloud Specialist
certifications.content: Certied by CloudBull Asia for completing a course on SalesForce for building and deploying cloud applications.

certifications.title: Python 3
certifications.content: Certied by Udemy as a Python 3 programmer after completing their online course.
